comments:
Maybe EMF 2.2 will officially depend on Eclipse 3.2, but not knowing surely
about this I thought I'd mention it here: running EMF 2.2 I200510200124 on
Eclipse 3.1.1, I'm seeing this problem:

Error 2005-10-27 17:17:40.442 Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in:
"org.eclipse.jface".

Yes, this dependency is known.  We continue to move to new Eclipse APIs so as to
avoid generating code that will raise deprecation warnings for our users.
